name: rz-file-manager
description: A modern WordPress file manager with React frontend

scripts.package: npm run build && rm -rf rz-file-manager build/rz-file-manager.zip && mkdir rz-file-manager && cp -R includes assets rz-file-manager.php uninstall.php rz-file-manager/ && zip -r rz-file-manager.zip rz-file-manager -x "*.DS_Store" "*/.DS_Store" && mkdir -p build && mv rz-file-manager.zip build/rz-file-manager.zip && rm -rf rz-file-manager

author: RZ
